class_notes:
(Same as MUS 356W 1)
3+ hours a week asynchronous learning additional
course_description: This undergraduate course on the contributions of women in music explores the power of perspective in historical narrative, gender and control in music, how spiritual tradition is intertwined with music, and how women in music are perceived cross-culturally.
sections: Class Nbr: 1652, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-1p, Instructor: L. Bertrand, Status: Open
